features: Go Green - Both the toothbrushes and packaging are eco-friendly, allowing you to clean your teeth with a clear conscience every day. Plus, the zero-waste design provides you with a natural oral product.

12 Durable Toothbrushes - The design is robust and durable, with each toothbrush lasting up to 6-months of use. What's more, every pack features 12 bamboo toothbrushes, making this a cost-effective way to keep the family brushing.

Soft Bristles - Our BPA-free, charcoal-infused bristles feel soft on teeth and gums. We only use premium quality materials that are sustainably sourced, which makes all Greenzla products natural & eco-friendly.

Smooth and Natural Bamboo Handle - Our wooden toothbrushes aren't just soft on your teeth, but also in your hands. The comfortable handle fits perfectly in the palm of your hand for an added level of convenience.

Quality You Can Trust - The Greenzla brand is committed to high-quality, environmentally-friendly products that are natural & eco-friendly. We believe in our products so much that we offer a money-back guarantee if youre not completely satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very soft bristles yet they really clean my teeth well. Easy to hold handle, and such a good look with the bamboo handle and natural bristles. Looks very high-end and expensive, even though it was very affordable. All-natural packaging, and very fast shipping. Won't ever go back to the old plastic ones. These are outstanding quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’ve liked these for years
reviews.reviewText: I love the feel of the bamboo, and I keep both a white and black bristle out for myself. Day and night use, automatically color coded. My protectors also fit over the bristles on these as well. The bristles are not too stiff, they’re soft, and it seems they last longer than the bulky plastic toothbrush bristles. Bamboo doesn’t absorb water, very quick drying, and that’s a huge plus. It seems more antibacterial this way. I’ve used these for years and will continued to buy them. There’s no plastic and slick cardboard waste packaging with these but they are well packaged, simple and nothing unnecessary. I know many people have found uses for the wooden handles after the bristles go “past it.” I haven’t yet, but I’ll keep thinking of something - gardening stake markers (you can write on them) or painted something, I don’t know. There’ll be something. At least it’s not more plastic to toss into a landfill and I really like that!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money. These seem like they are great quality. I love that the bristles are softer than the typical plastic tooth brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like these but read on for concerns
reviews.reviewText: I switched to sift natural bristle wood handle brush ages ago and once use to them I’ll never go back to plastic.However this brand , while I’m using two of the white ones and still don’t know if the other boxes are black bristled or not , this is the first white bristled ones I’ve bought, which I assume is another way besides numbered handles to help families or couples to keep them apart; my main complaint is that the fine point edge on the bristles on these seem cut a little sharp .I am used to them now and brush lightly and they are fine. Generally the wood designed brushes are much more soft bristled than plastic traditional ones, which takes some getting used to for most people and is what I love about them and why I won’t go back to industry standard brushes .. and these are just in the sweet spot of good cleaning firm but soft feel that cleans well, but it’s like something on their machine that makes the bristles the very tips of the brush felt sharp like it was micro cutting my gums at first until I got used to it or they wore in after about 10 uses ..They are fine brushes but I’ll be trying another brand after I make it through this big box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and durable. (Edit: Best customer service!)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Final Edit: I contacted the company to see if i could get a replacement or a discount for a replacement just for the toothbrush holder, and I ended up getting a replacement for the whole set a few days later!!!! Amazing customer service!Edit: I ordered a second time about a year and a half later. This one arrived with a broken toothbrush holder. There was a Crack right down the middle of one side. I know this brand makes great quality products, but I'm disappointed my second time ordering came with broken product.Original review for first time ordering:All of the contents are in a small paper box.As described, all came: -4 brushes. - 1 floss tube. - 1 travel case. Each toothbrush is in an individual box within the package. The floss bottle I recieved did come as pictured, with a hole and blade on the lid. It actually came threaded already, which was super helpful. I have seen some reviews that said otherwise, but mine did indeed came as picturedThe travel case had a tight lid, so you will not have to worry that your toothbrush will fall out if it is in your backpack.The bristles are super soft, and the bamboo is very smooth. There are leaf images on each brush. There is a different number of leaves on each brush so you can easy get this for household and not be confused on whose is whose, since you can identify the different number of leaf images on your brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft bristles. Sturdy yet ecofriendly handle. Love this. Will buy again! 👍👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These brushes are soft enough to feel pleasant when using. They are also sturdy and last for several brushings. They are individually boxed, which makes it easy to pack them for traveling. I think they are good value for the money and I would be them again when I run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Soft Bristles
reviews.reviewText: I brush and floss at least twice a day and prefer bamboo toothbrushes, so I was happy to see such a great deal and gladly purchased them. These bristles are not soft at all and have made my gums bleed every time I've used them - something that is very rare for me. They work fine as a regular toothbrush if you're looking for hard bristles, but I wouldn't recommend them if your mouth is sensitive.

I think these tooth brushes are perfect. Soft but still sturdy enough to actually clean. People who are saying they are too hard but not clean their teeth/gums well cause this definitely doesn't hurt.
Ottimo prodotto, rapporto qualità prezzo davvero eccezionale, setole morbide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these toothbrushes, it's the perfect size for me. With a small enough head, it's easy to reach the back teeth. The brush is soft enough so doesn't hurt the gum but strong enough so it's cleaning the teeth, with perfect balance. I can't go back to plastic toothbrushes after using this. I like the packaging and everything about it.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Nachhaltige Zahnpflege im Praxistest: Die Greenzla Bambus Zahnbürsten nach monatelanger Verwendung"
reviews.reviewText: Praxistest:Die Greenzla Bambus Zahnbürsten wurden in einem ausführlichen Praxistest von meiner Familie über einen Zeitraum von mehreren Monaten verwendet. Während dieses Zeitraums wurden verschiedene Aspekte wie Haltbarkeit, Benutzerfreundlichkeit und Nachhaltigkeit bewertet.Eine der bemerkenswertesten Eigenschaften der Greenzla Bambus Zahnbürsten ist ihre Haltbarkeit. Selbst nach mehreren Monaten intensiver Verwendung wiesen die Borsten keine signifikante Abnutzung auf. Dies zeigt, dass die Zahnbürsten eine langanhaltende Lösung für die Zahnpflege bieten.Die Benutzerfreundlichkeit der Zahnbürsten wurde ebenfalls positiv bewertet. Die Bürsten liegen angenehm in der Hand und ermöglichen eine gründliche Reinigung von Zähnen und Zahnfleisch. Die Bambusgriffe fühlen sich natürlich an und sind rutschfest.Fazit:Nach monatelangem Gebrauch können wir feststellen, dass die Greenzla Bambus Zahnbürsten eine hervorragende Wahl für umweltbewusste Verbraucher sind. Sie bieten nicht nur eine hohe Haltbarkeit und Benutzerfreundlichkeit, sondern auch den Vorteil der Nachhaltigkeit. Die Tatsache, dass sie keine signifikante Abnutzung aufweisen, macht sie zu einer kosteneffizienten und umweltfreundlichen Alternative zu herkömmlichen Plastikzahnbürsten.Mit ihrem angenehmen Griff und der effektiven Reinigungsfähigkeit sind die Greenzla Bambus Zahnbürsten eine Empfehlung für jeden, der einen Beitrag zum Umweltschutz leisten und gleichzeitig eine qualitativ hochwertige Zahnbürste verwenden möchte.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cepillos de dientes naturales y biodegradables
reviews.reviewText: Pack de 12 cepillos de dientes comprados a 9,99€ (aproximadamente 0,83€ por unidad):• Tanto los cepillos (bambú) como los envases (cartón) son ecológicos, reciclables y biodegradables. Este es un punto importante de cara a la lucha por el medioambiente. Además de la caja grande, los cepillos vienen en envases más pequeñitos, organizados de 2 en 2, lo que facilita su transporte en caso de tener que viajar.• Los cepillos tienen dos colores diferentes de cerdas: blanco y negro. Además, cada cepillo está numerado para que su identificación sea más sencilla.• La dureza de los cepillos es blanda, lo que ayuda a evitar el desgaste del esmalte de los dientes. Estoy acostumbrada a cepillos un poco menos suaves (de dureza media), pero el cambio no es desagradable.• Hay que tener un especial cuidado en cuanto a su conservación y secar bien el cepillo después de cada uso, ya que el bambú tiende a enmohecerse si permanece húmedo mucho tiempo.A pesar de que no son tan cómodos como un cepillo de plástico ergonómico, los beneficios que ofrecen (sobre todo en el ámbito de reducir el daño a la naturaleza) son suficientes como para que merezca la pena pasarse a ellos, al menos, en nuestro caso.100% recomendables.
